channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 07:17 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 07:17 Air anxiety in the Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:16 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Dniprovskyi district-Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community-Chervono-Oblast.
item.description: 游리 05:16 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Dniprovskyi district-Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community-Chervono-Oblast. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
